name: Lady Bouvier's Lover
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Bill Oakley, Josh Weinstein, Bill Canterbury (staff writer), David X. Cohen (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Grampa falls in love with Marge's mother, but must compete with Mr. Burns for her heart.
